posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off SGC 5
posts.post_content:
FS: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off SGC 5
(PWCC gave it their "E" Top 15% for the grade)
Asking $24.5k but willing to listen to offers.
Trade would be for some lower grade T206 Cobbs (all 4) that I still need (which is a pretty long list still)... preference to tougher backs.
